API Reference¶

Feature¶

ptsarray(pts[, u, v])

An array of points in two-dimensional space, a subclass of numpy.ndarray.

ZPs(n_max, size[, states])

The Zernike polynomials class

zmarray(input_array[, n, m, mode])

Class representing (pseudo) Zernike moments, which is a subclass of numpy.ndarray.

local_max(img[, block_size, method, …])

Find peaks in an image as array with the shape of (num_pts, 2).

Force-directed Embedding¶

ForceGraph8([X, n_neighbors, metric, …])

compute_graph(X, n_neighbors, metric[, …])

compute_nodes(init_xy)

Compute nodes (structured array) from initial layout

compute_pairs(graph)

Compute pairs from nonzero entries of the graph

Scientific Plot¶

generate_h_axes(fig[, n, y, left, right, …])

Create a set of horizontal axes.

ptsarray is good
